title: Bowl, "Model #242", ca. 1920
markings: Marks: Stamped on underside of foot: "[factory mark of G. Jensen in a beaded cir- cle beneath crown] / STERLING / 242 / DENMARK / GJ 925 S in a beaded oval."Unidentified mark of a figure in beaded circle, with scratched "CF"
description: Circular stepped and domed foot supports circular bowl. Central support ofupright grape cluster and three curled fronds, and outer supports of six leaf and scroll tendrils. Bowl is concave, plain hammered silver, with flared and everted rim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, "Model #242", ca. 1920.
ca. 1920. silver. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1986-109-2.
